title: SQL Feature requests
author: Nicolaj-ITS
body_snippet:
<!-- Feature Request -->
- Read-Only SQL DB mode(Instead of using the readonly permission workaround)

- Save-DB function(instead of working live in the DB, make the changes and hit save to write them to db)

- SQL DB reload freq setting(Instead of it reloading constantly, eg. 60 secs or something)

- MSSQL Windows Authentication(Right now it only uses SQL Auth, with windows auth we could use domain logins for the db)
<!-- If you file a feature request, please delete the bug section -->...

iterations.description: Issue has no body or description - just a title 'SQL Feature requests' with no details about what SQL features are being requested

notes:
AI triage: Issue has no body or description - just a title 'SQL Feature requests' with no details about what SQL features are being requested
Approach: Need reporter to specify which SQL-related features they want added or improved before any work can be planned
